summary: Completed comprehensive testing of NiftyAlgo Trading Bot. Backend APIs are 100% functional. Frontend dashboard loads correctly with all panels visible. Found one critical UI bug in Settings modal tab switching.

ui_bugs.issue: Risk Parameters tab not switching content properly - shows API Credentials content instead
ui_bugs.selector: Risk Parameters tab in Settings modal
ui_bugs.details: When clicking 'Risk Parameters' tab, the tab appears selected but content remains on API Credentials form. Risk parameter inputs (order_qty, max_trades, etc.) are not visible.

integration_issues.issue: Start button remains enabled but bot doesn't start without credentials
integration_issues.details: Expected behavior - bot should show error message or disable start button when credentials not configured

passed_tests: All 13 backend API endpoints working (100% success rate)
Dashboard loads with all 7 panels visible (TopBar, PositionPanel, ControlsPanel, NiftyTracker, TradesTable, DailySummary, LogsViewer)
Status badges display correct states (Stopped, Market Open, LIVE, Connected)
Settings modal opens and API Credentials tab works correctly
Start/Stop/Square Off buttons are visible and appropriately enabled/disabled
Position panel shows 'No Open Position' correctly
Nifty data displays placeholder values when no credentials configured
Bot logs display correctly with filtering functionality
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix Settings modal Risk Parameters tab switching bug. The tab content is not switching properly - when 'Risk Parameters' tab is clicked, it should show risk parameter inputs but currently shows API Credentials content instead.

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (1 minor UI bug in settings modal tab switching)
